text: Siim Kallas (born 2 October 1948) is an Estonian politician. He was the European Commissioner for Transport between 2010 and 2014. Before that he was European Commissioner for Administrative Affairs, Audit and Anti-Fraud between 2004 and 2009. Kallas was Prime Minister of Estonia from 2002 to 2003. His daughter is Prime Minister Kaja Kallas. ==Other websites== *Siim Kallas, Official Media Gallery *Official website *KALLAS Siim International Who's Who *European Parliament Answers to Commissioner Designate M. title: Siim Kallas
